title: 17th Century Manuscript – Rumtek
description: Digitized Buddhist manuscript from Rumtek Monastery containing ancient prayers and teachings written in Tibetan script. This precious document showcases the rich literary tradition of Tibetan Buddhism.

title: Wall Mural – Pemayangtse
description: High-resolution mural from Pemayangtse Monastery depicting Buddhist deities and symbols. The intricate artwork demonstrates the exceptional skill of traditional Tibetan artists.

title: Sacred Thangka Painting – Tashiding
description: A beautiful thangka painting from Tashiding Monastery depicting Guru Padmasambhava. This sacred art piece is used for meditation and religious instruction.

title: Prayer Book Collection – Rumtek
description: A collection of ancient prayer books containing daily chants and ritual instructions used by monks in their spiritual practice.

title: Ceremonial Vessel – Pemayangtse
description: An ornate ceremonial vessel used in religious rituals, crafted with traditional Tibetan metalworking techniques and adorned with precious stones.

title: Buddha Statue Documentation – Tashiding
description: Detailed documentation of an ancient Buddha statue including measurements, materials, and historical significance within the monastery.
